edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge

Interface ZKCommonInput

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SigmaCommonInput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SigmaANDCommonInput, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueCommonInput, SigmaDHCommonInput, SigmaDHExtendedCommonInput, SigmaDHExtendedStatisticalCommonInput, SigmaDJEncryptedValueCommonInput, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroCommonInput, SigmaDJKnowledgeCommonInput, SigmaDJProductCommonInput, SigmaDlogCommonInput, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeCommonInput, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueCommonInput, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueCommonInput, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyCommonInput, SigmaORMultipleCommonInput, SigmaORTwoCommonInput, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeCommonInput, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueCommonInput, ZKPOKFiatShamirCommonInput

    public interface ZKCommonInput
    This interface is a marker interface for Zero Knowledge input, where there is an implementing class for each concrete Zero Knowledge protocol.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
